page.title: 04STEAD McALPINE
page.content: using the flat bed and roller technique. The firm employs three hundred and fifteen people,of these about fifty five are women working in administration the art department and in the dining room.The two hundred and sixty men work in all departments of the company.Most people work for the company for a very long time.many staying all their working lives.The company has recently spent a lot of money on new printing machinery.They also have computers with terminals in America and london to keep indirect contact with their customers.The company which spends two thousands pounds a day on fuel for the factory has recently converted from oil to gas in the hope of making substantial savings.The company is an important part of the iocal community
